rule_manager.title: Rule Manager
rule_manager.copy_to_clipboard: All local rules have been copied to the clipboard

rule_edit.title: Rule Editing
rule_edit.help_rule_name:
[Rule Name]
• Purpose: Set the name of this rule for display and differentiation in the interface
• Example: Sakura Anime, Dimension Anime, etc.
• Requirements: Cannot be empty, recommend using the website's common name
rule_edit.help_base_url:
[Website Domain]
• Purpose: Specify the target website's domain for matching and identification
• Format: Enter only the domain portion, no protocol prefix required (such as http:// or https://)
• Example: www.example.com, oneanime.com, etc.
• Note: Supports main domains and subdomains, do not include path portions
rule_edit.help_logo_url:
[Logo Path]
• Purpose: Specify the path of the website logo for interface display
• Format: Can use relative path or full URL path (without protocol prefix)
• Example: logo.png, images/site-logo.svg, static/logo.jpg
• Support: Common image formats such as PNG, JPG, SVG
rule_edit.help_search_img_selector:
[Search Image Selector]
• Purpose: Locate thumbnail elements on the search results page
• Format: CSS selector syntax, used to extract image links from the list page
• Example: img.thumbnail, .image-box img, [data-src], .cover-image
• Common types: img tags, divs with background images, data attributes, etc.
rule_edit.help_detail_title_selector:
[Detail Title Selector]
• Purpose: Extract title content on the details page
• Format: CSS selector, usually a title tag or title class name
• Example: h1.title, .detail-title, article h1, header h2
• Suggestion: Prioritize elements with high uniqueness and stable structure
rule_edit.help_detail_desc_selector:
[Detail Description Selector]
• Purpose: Extract description or summary information on the details page
• Format: CSS selector, typically a paragraph or description container
• Example: .description, p.summary, .intro-text, .content-brief
• Note: Select elements containing key descriptive information
rule_edit.help_detail_content_selector:
[Detail Content Selector]
• Purpose: Extract core content on the details page
• Format: CSS selector, usually the article body or content container
• Example: .content, article, .detail-content, main div
• Important: This is the key selector for scraping main content, please ensure accuracy
rule_edit.help_enable_rule:
[Enable Rule]
• Purpose: Control whether this rule is effective
• Enabled: Rule will be used, participating in web parsing
• Disabled: Rule will be disabled, not participating in parsing process
• Usage: Convenient for testing and managing multiple rules
rule_edit.base_url_protocol_validator: Do not include protocol prefix (http:// or https://)
rule_edit.logo_url_validator: Please enter the website logo URL
rule_edit.timeout_hint: Default 5 seconds, requests will be cancelled after this time
